EmailTemplate.description: Notification of incomplete details in Joining Form
EmailTemplate.name: Incompletion in Joining Form
EmailTemplate.subject: Ref nr {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for submitting the documentation for joining [Select operation BSP OR CASS and insert Country] .<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
In order for us to finalize your application, please note that you should complete section [Insert elaborated comments] from the application form.
The following details are missing or incomplete:
(provide application form item number and description of the missing or incomplete details)
Please do not hesitate to contact this office, by replying to this email, in case of any further queries/assistance that may be required with regards to the above. Our team will be glad to assist you accordingly.
Thank you!
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Global Airline Participation Team
Industry Distribution and Financial Services
International Air Transport Association
33, Route de l'AÃ©roport
1215 Geneva 15 Airport
Switzerland
